name: Gacha Shop
description:
Very barebone game testing RNG chances of getting games.
Core feature, the gacha, works.
There are few other features such as selling and inventory.

Upcoming features would be buying abilities to increase rates, increase the amount of types you roll the gacha, items, vanity and other gacha passes.
Crafting items to crate rarer items to sell or use.
Financing, where you get loans to pay for your gambling addiction and pay off eventually.
Stat tracking.
Create your own gacha with custom rates and items. Get so much items and cash you can't be bothered clicking 'Sell All' just to see your money value go up? Why not open up your own gacha to profit off other vic- I mean, players like you.
Be a benevolent maker or the eater of leviathans.
Now that I think about it, visible money vault that reflects how much money you have, be it gold, jewelry or paper money.

I may come to work on this more, but as it is, I lost motivation to continue this UI Intensive game.

Here are some key bindings.
L is give item Egg
M is add 900 money
K is remove item Egg
J is remove item wood
